Export.CSP:
<script language="Cache" runat="Server"> set a=##class(Vacancy.Vacancy).%OpenId($Get(%request.Data("id",1),1)) set oid=a.Img.%Oid() </script>
<image src="%25CSP.StreamServer.cls?STREAMOID=#(..Encrypt(oid))#">
<script language="Cache" runat="Server"> Set httpR=##class(Vacancy.VacancyView).%New() s httpR.Browser=%session.BrowserName s httpR.URL=%request.URL s httpR.TimeStamp=$zdt($h,4) s httpR.IP=%request.GatewayConnectionName //w ##class(%SYSTEM.INetInfo).GetInterfacesInfo() s httpR.Vacancy=$Get(%request.Data("id",1),1) do httpR.%Save() </script>
